===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to harm (a person) to death, by various means, deliberate or ignorant, direct or indirect; to harass someone to death

====Usage notes====
Can be used non-literally for exaggeration:
: {{zh-x|你 可 害死 我 了，讓 我 坐 公交 不 坐 地鐵。|''You '''sent me to hell''', telling me to take the bus instead of the subway.''}}
